overview: Theft, Nudity, Drugs And A Kombi Called 'Betsy' Jake is awoken in the middle of the night to his 1970 Volkswagen Kombi 'Betsy' being hotwired and stolen. With no time to spare, Jake and his roommate Ben go on wild goose chase around Brisbane. With Jake only in his underwear and socks, Ben in colourful pajamas, the night has only just begun...
title: Ignition
